title: Tales of the Solar Rangers Showdown on Ceres - Victoria Kodai.ep
description:
The year is 1995; It was a time of wonder and advancement for Earth. Intelligent life was discovered among the majestic ancient cities of Mars and Venus. Earth, Venus and Mars later formed the Solar Federation; a planetary alliance functioning as a union for open-trade, justice and immigration. In this union the Solar Defense Force was born.

From the Golden Age of science fiction tradition comes the story of a team of elite Solar Defense Force Rangers on an urgent mission to uncover the truth about the death of a fellow Ranger. The investigation takes them to the outer asteroid colony Ceres City where they find themselves caught up in a dangerous conspiracy that threatens their own lives as well as the future of the colony. A prequel to Tales of the Solar Rangers: The Time Thieves of Mars.
